Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Peisistratos. From same die of Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX GAB 0986.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (222)
